About Mobile Fortress

Mobile Fortress is a ficticious company name made up because Mobile Fortress was already taken (and made into an actual company). We specialize in Vaprware products that you'd never want to spend your money on, because you'll never actually get anything for it.

Founded in 2013

From relatively small beginnings, Mobile Fortress grew into an almost unstoppable force, as clients everywhere were practically beating each other up in order to get some of Mobile Fortress's signature Mobile-Appety goodness.
